name: Cozy Cat Cafe
description:
As you begin, hungry cats come meowing at your back door. You must feed them according to their requests. If they're happy, they reward you with acorns to then be used to purchase decor for your home. 

The game is incredibly relaxing, chill, and just fun to play. 

This game was a submission for the 2019 Global Jame in Austin, Texas.

Team -

Courtney Huynh - Main Artist, Programmer

David Zhu - Artist, Programmer

Gahwon Lee - Composer, Main Programmer

Matthew Maxwell - Sound Designer

Robert Guan - Artist, Programmer
